scripts.db:connect: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && echo Database reset! Run npm run db:start to restart
scripts.db:backup: docker compose exec postgres pg_dump -U jondb_admin jon_database_dev > database/backups/backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.sql:run: docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.schema:create: type database\project\01_core_schema.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.schema:drop: docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c "DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS app CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA app;"
scripts.schema:rebuild: npm run schema:drop && npm run schema:create
scripts.seeds:reference: type database\seeds\00_reference_data.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.seeds:patients: type database\seeds\01_patients_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.seeds:doctors: type database\seeds\02_doctors_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.seeds:test-users: type database\seeds\03_test_users.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.seeds:run: npm run seeds:reference && npm run seeds:patients && npm run seeds:doctors
scripts.queries:validate: type database\queries\00_validation_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:test: type database\queries\test_queries.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:doctor: type database\queries\01_doctor_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d  jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:patient: type database\queries\02_patient_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:doctorTest: type database\queries\03_doctorTest_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:patientTest: type database\queries\04_patientTest_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:sideEffects: type database\queries\05_sideEffect_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:run: npm run queries:validate && npm run queries:test
scripts.migrate:up: for file in database/migrations/*.sql; do type "$file" | npm run sql:run; done
scripts.project:fresh: npm run db:reset && npm run db:start && timeout /t 30 && npm run schema:create && npm run seeds:run
